meanings.sent1: She always speaks in an unrude manner.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be unrude when talking to others.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpy cat couldn't resist her unrude charm.
meanings.sent4: His unrude behavior was like a breath of fresh air in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unrude smile on her face made everyone feel welcome.

meanings.sent1: He offered his seat on the bus in an unrude gesture.
meanings.sent2: Being unrude includes saying please and thank you.
meanings.sent3: The unrude way he held the door open made her blush.
meanings.sent4: Her unrude actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The unrude handshake sealed the deal.

meanings.sent1: The unrude student always helped his classmates.
meanings.sent2: She wrote an unrude thank you note for the gift.
meanings.sent3: The unrude way he shared his lunch was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: His unrude nature shone through even in difficult situations.
meanings.sent5: The unrude apology was sincere and heartfelt.
